loan.name: Valle Los G. Pantasma Group
loan.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides, manure, etc.
loan.description:
Blanca is 35 years old, single, and the mother of four children. She is a coffee farmer, and she started doing agricultural work with her parents' help. In addition, she earns income as a day laborer at nearby farms.

She is requesting a new loan from Fundenuse and Kiva to buy fertilizers, insecticides, manure, etc. Her goal is to continue with her work and repay her loan according to the repayment schedule.

The members belong to the "Valle de los G. Pantasma" loan group, along with Miguel and Jos√©, who are also dedicated to agriculture.
loan.whySpecial: It helps farmers manage their cash flows and provide access to health insurance.
